post.body: ...I may take you up on it. My orders are to make it 'less busy' yet retain familiarity with the original. on my sixth rev so far
goodnight you old geek. ;)(
but intrigued it is. ;)
I was thinking something in red would be nice.
on the fourth part now. So far so good.
what PM. I don't see any from you.
Hackmasster product on the shelves of Buy More where he works. Look for HM on the shelves in the xmas episode.
They started this season as far as I know. Issues of KODT on Chucks desk/bulletin board in his room.
...on issue 147. She's fighting going in the bag. But I almost have her. ;)
...;) Not having one this year. Most of the D-Team is going to be scattered around the Globe. Steve in Italy. Dave in Florida.
...9 parts Jack. 1 part Eggnog.
...I made some changes I'm hoping will be seen from teh next satellite imagery updates.
...see my van in the drive? ;) too bad it's such old footage. We've really been busy here. landscaping, new bathroom, etc.
lol. perhaps not 'guite' to the second floor. But I did have trouble getting out of the shack after almost getting snowed in.
wow. thanks. That's certainly encouraging as I work on 147. ;) Glad to hear 146 is finally hitting the street.
Thank for the feedback.
...Yeah I love the night. Fewer interruptions. Sort of feel like I have the world to myself. I'm certainly more creative.
...nic pic.
we get about two or three letters a year on Squirrely being abused. Nothing major.
yeah it can be scary. I bought meat from a guy an dthen began wondering if it was really beef. I mean it could be ANYTHING. ;)
Ibought meat off a guy from the back of a van last year. Been in the deep freezer ever since. I'm afraid to eat it.
you're wrong. we're all perfect. It's YOUwho is the. problem. ;) Just keep doing what you do.
whoot. congrats!!!
...Well I appreciate it. I'm a bit punch today. ;) Fixed the auction. Should be fine now.
...Everyone should check out that index. It's pretty amazing. Compiled by the AD of the TV show CHUCK no less. How cool is that?
...I wanna job where I can say 'bullshit' and nobody gives me grief. ;)
...Good stuff (the quiche) Barb cooked it up yesterday. Great as left overs. I'm eating some now.
...I had a run in with a deer a few years ago in my van. $3,500 in damage. And I didn't even get to eat the bugger.
...to bad you can't swing it. We could have served you quiche. ;)
lol. How much time to you waste on twitter? http://tweetwasters.com
Made quiche for the family for lunch. Back to working on the HM5 logo. Dave and the others are kicking back previous concepts. It's on....
Working on the HackMaster 5 logo after getting some feedback from the others. Nice relaxing work.
Well John Adams sure ended on a downer of a note. The dude dies.
FYI KODT 148 deadline reminder: January 5th.
working on the HM5 teaser ad and watching the last installment of John Adams. Whew. Didn't realize it was ten hours long.
installed keyclick on my laptop. Forgot how much I missed the sound of a typewriter. I'm in love
on part III of John Adams. Better than I expected. feeling grateful.
The Fandango movie widget is the awesome. Too cool.
Geeze. Adamsblock i down due to death threats. Crazyiness. http://adamsblock.com/apology.html
watching John Adams the HBO mini series on DVD. I hope it's about BEER.
hoody hoo. Got a email from the Assist Dir of the TV show CHUCK. Looks like there could be more KODT goodness coming...
on the homestretch here. no. really.
Trying to the wife out to the shack to listen to some strips.
Finishing up issue 147. Not going to make the HackMaster 5 playtest/devleop game tonight. Tis sad.
Just came across some books EGG signed for me. Find myself missing him and thinking of his wife, Gail.
my daugher has turned me on to the wonders of Smucker's Uncrustables. yumm.
Okay people keep asking about the writing "shack" Here's a pic. http://gallery.me.com/jollybgood#100510/IMG_0008&bgcolor=black
had a nice nap. Gave the cats some treats. Back to the "shed" to layout some more strips.
Back at the computer. I feel a good six hours in me. (knock wood)
whew. Taking a break from writing. Gonna go rustle up something to eat. Maybe push some more snow.
Sitting here working on an adventure and thinking Norm McDonald would make an excellent NPC/hireling.
Layed out 13 pages. breaking for dinner and some tv.
Second piece of original KODT art up on ebay. http://tinyurl.com/8jukt6
KODT 147 preview is here... http://tinyurl.com/8yn2xe
I'm on a roll... If I can just stave off the eye strain I'll be good.
Good news. Steve Job isn't terminally ill. Just a hormone imbalance that caused some weight loss.
Just found out I get to play plumber tomorrow morning at the office. PVC drain pipe leaking. I love any opp to use tools & grunt like an ape
After a short break hooking up the new center speakers I'm back at the keyboard. Going for ten pages today since I whimped on Saturday.
Steampunk Monopoly -- too cool. http://tinyurl.com/9tyqc3
Familiars in D&D 4e -- feature article in this month's issue of KODT (147). Great piece by Lloyd Brown.
